definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces
tree name (variously Paulownia, Firmiana or Aleurites)

sentences.english: Yields of paste from flowers of three Paulownia species were compared.
sentences.chinese: 但評香的結果毛泡桐花浸膏的香氣較濃郁。

sentences.english: It is also the national famous "hometown of paulownia", the National Advanced City for Plain Afforestation.
sentences.chinese: 是全國著名的“泡桐之鄉”，爲全國平原綠化先進市。

sentences.english: The results showed that paulownia leaves can be used as good fodder.
sentences.chinese: 探討了泡桐樹葉作飼料的可能性。

sentences.english: The mechanism of disease resistance of this type is that it resists insect vector.
sentences.chinese: 該類型泡桐抗病的主要機制是抗傳毒的媒介昆蟲之故。

sentences.english: From industrial practice, it was shown that high efficient drying of paulownia lumber is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 生產實踐證明，泡桐板材的高效乾燥是可行的。

sentences.english: The reason and mechanism of paulownia stain are briefly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了真菌致泡桐材變色原因及機理。

sentences.english: Object: The naphtha was extracted from the flowers of Paulownia tomentosa (Thunb) Steud.
sentences.chinese: 目的從毛泡桐花中提取揮發油。

sentences.english: Chinense paulownia leaves followed by slower growth of gross paulownia .
sentences.chinese: 楸葉泡桐次之，毛泡桐生長較慢。

sentences.english: Chinense paulownia leaves followed by slower growth of gross paulownia .
sentences.chinese: 楸葉泡桐次之，毛泡桐生長較慢。

sentences.english: Conclusion: The flowers of Paulownia tomentosa (Thunb) Steud contain plenty of the naphtha.
sentences.chinese: 結論毛泡桐花中含有較豐富的揮發油。

poplar tree/various trees of genus Populus
Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
